de.tif.jacob.core.definition
Interface IDomainDefinition

All Superinterfaces:
INamedObjectDefinition
public interface IDomainDefinition
extends INamedObjectDefinition

This interface represents a domain definition.

Method Summary
 boolean canCollapse()
          All forms in this domain are visible if this method returns [true].
 DataScope getDataScope()
          Returns the data scope of this domain definition.
 java.util.List getFormDefinitions()
          Returns the list of all form definitions of this domain.
 java.util.List getFormGroupDefinitions()
          Returns the list of all form group definitions of this domain.
 java.util.List getRoleNames()
          Returns the names of all role names, which have been granted access to this domain.
 java.lang.String getTitle()
          Returns the title of this domain.
 boolean isVisible()
          Returns the default visibility of this domain.

getDescription, getName, getProperties, getProperty
 

Method Detail

getRoleNames

java.util.List getRoleNames()
Returns the names of all role names, which have been granted access to this domain.

Returns:
List of String

getFormDefinitions

java.util.List getFormDefinitions()
Returns the list of all form definitions of this domain.

Returns:
List of IFormDefinition

getFormGroupDefinitions

java.util.List getFormGroupDefinitions()
Returns the list of all form group definitions of this domain.

Returns:
List of IFormGroupDefinition

getTitle

java.lang.String getTitle()
Returns the title of this domain.

Note: The title could be internationalized, if the title starts with a '%' character. In this case the title is interpreted as a key to the respective application resource bundles for internationalization.

Returns:
the domain title.

getDataScope

DataScope getDataScope()
Returns the data scope of this domain definition.

Returns:
the data scope or null, if this domain does not overwrite the default data scope definition of the application.
Since:
2.7.4
See Also:
IApplicationDefinition.getDataScope()

isVisible

boolean isVisible()
Returns the default visibility of this domain.

Returns:
true if visible otherwise false

canCollapse

boolean canCollapse()
All forms in this domain are visible if this method returns [true]. In the other case you must click on the domain to expand the UI navigation.

Returns:
true if the user can expand/collapse the domain navigation entry
